Texts.Chs: 现在让我们开始做^green;瓦特酒^white;吧。把1份^orange;酵母水^white;和2个^orange;瓦特果^white;外加2份^orange;葡萄醪^white;一起放到^orange;发酵器^white;里，然后开始酿造吧。
Texts.Eng: And now let's make some ^green;Wartwine^white;. Combine an ^orange;Empty Glass Bottle^white;, ^orange;Yeast Water^white;, 2 ^orange;Wartweed^white;, and 2 ^orange;Grape Mash^white; in the ^orange;Fermenter^white;.

Texts.Chs: 优秀！它看起来真是美味极了，不是吗？但这只是开始。你将会酿造出更棒的酒的！
Texts.Eng: Excellent! It looks tasty, doesn't it? But this is just the beginning. You'll craft even more glorious alcohol soon!
